body.title: Human Extended Cognition - How Natural Language Interface Unlocks Unprecedent Levels of Intelligence
body.speaker: Rogerio Rodrigues
body.description:
In this session, we‚Äôll explore the very nature of human cognition and how Artificial Intelligence‚Äîparticularly through Natural Language Processing‚Äîreshapes the way we interact with technology, work, communities, and even our own sense of self.

Together, we‚Äôll dive into concepts like Cognitive Engineering, Systems Design, Data-Driven Reasoning, Practical Skill Acquisition, Extended Cognition, Theory of Mind, Consciousness, Psychology of Self, Somatics, Neuroscience, Mythopoetics, Storytelling, and Sound Production. We‚Äôll also cover practical productivity frameworks such as the Eisenhower Matrix, Pomodoro, Kanban, and Scrum, enriched by philosophical traditions like SISU and Stoicism. Most importantly, we‚Äôll confront the ethical challenges of adopting AI and how to safeguard autonomy and sovereignty of mind in a world increasingly driven by algorithms.

This session blends theory with actionable practice, helping participants see AI not just as a tool, but as a partner in extending human potential.

By the end of this session, participants will be able to:
1. Identify and Assess AI Tools ‚Üí Match tools to workflows (e.g., research, benchmarking, pitch decks, upskilling, dashboarding).
2. Master Prompt Engineering ‚Üí Craft effective prompts by thinking 2‚Äì3 steps ahead, applying strategies inspired by Sun Tzu‚Äôs Art of War.
3. Explore Core AI Platforms ‚Üí Hands-on awareness of ChatGPT, Gemini, Copilot, Gamma, Suno, and Sora.
4. Apply AI in Processes ‚Üí Learn how AI supports vendor onboarding, production dashboarding, digital transformation, and project management.
5. Protect Mental Sovereignty ‚Üí Understand how social media feeds on negative emotions and discover strategies to reclaim autonomy while using technology to enhance‚Äîrather than diminish‚Äîquality of life.
6. Adopt a Sustainable Outlook ‚Üí Leave with a more optimistic and practical vision for integrating AI into daily life, work, and society.
